page.title: 08FARMING, COMM. CHELWOOD GATE
page.content:
As most of the farmland, not wooded, is enclosed pasture, this is given over mainly to sheep and horses, some hay and a few cattle. There is a rare breeds farm and a fruit farm at Wych Cross and at least one pig farm. Most of the horses are children's ponies, hacks and hunters. There is one Garden Centre supplying retailers only.
{COMMUNICATIONS - CHELWOOD GATE The area has a small telephone ex- change which is unusual in the current rapid development of telecommunica- tions. Most houses have a telephone and there are a few public telephone kiosks. There is one Post Office, two deliveries & collectionf of mail Monday to Friday, one on Saturday and none on Sunday.
